step_feedback.feedback: Good job sitting or standing comfortably. Keep your hands on your abdomen for the next step.
You're doing well with placing your hands on your abdomen. Remember to inhale slowly through your nose while tightening your whole body muscles.
Great job inhaling through your nose and tightening your muscles. Visualize fluid moving to your chest as you breathe in.
Excellent work exhaling slowly through your mouth and relaxing your muscles. Visualize pushing fluid out as you exhale.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with this deep breathing exercise! Keep up the good work of inhaling deeply while tightening your muscles and exhaling while relaxing. This helps your lymphatic system work better.
